information.title: In development
information.description: At the moment, all of our services, sites, and crap like that are in deep development. The developer is stupid - he doesn't want to do anything.

leggydog.title: Superior E621 telegram bot
leggydog.description: A bot that will keep you up-to-date with all new images on E621. You just specify what you like, and it'll just work!
